title: Restaurant Menu Slideshow
description: A slideshow application with an integrated menu designed for use at touchscreen kiosks at restaurants. Written in HTML/CSS/JS

title: Web Calendar
description: A rudimentary calendar with appointment scheduling, written with HTML/CSS/Javascript

title: Tank Driving Simulation
description: A small project using JQuery and Three.js allowing the user to drive small 3D tanks around in their browser/ Written with HTML/CSS/Javascript.
